main_display: Two rectangular objects (Object A and Object B) placed side-by-side. Inside each object, small, energetic 'heat particles' (dots/circles) are visible. Arrows indicate the direction of heat flow between the objects. Object colors dynamically change based on temperature.
animation_style: smooth and continuous particle movement and color transitions
visual_metaphor: Heat as energetic particles that move from areas of higher concentration/activity (hot) to areas of lower concentration/activity (cold), like water flowing downhill.
